name: Mx. Little Moo
description:
Mx. Little Moo

An adorable, pacman like game, where you play as a tiny moo, or other characters, and collect pebbles.

But be careful, there are different meanies, that will make you hurt!

Mx. Little Moo is inspired by Pacman. You collect pebbles for a high score, but that's not all!
You also have power ups, that can either increase your score, or help you out!
More than that, you can also sustain a few more hits than usual. Unless you pick a certain game mode.

Gamemodes are also a thing, with different ones and maps to unlock and play with. There are even different difficulties!
The demo version is very limited in what it offers, but is there so you can try before you buy.

Controls can be viewed inside of the game, but a quick rundown:

  • Movement is done via arrow keys or WASD
  • Select or using your special can be done via SPACE or ENTER
  • Pausing and Back is done via ESC or BACKSPACE

The cover image is provided by the very talented Ulvra
